result.markdown: --- title: "Interactions" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:----------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |2e |Coefficient of determination |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2e_r2.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/3rVrZDReDCk)| | | |2f |Predictions |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2f_predictions.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/AubAJT6fSHs)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2f_prediction.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2f_prediction.R)| |2g |Interactions |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2g_interactions.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/dtpJ3pn_GmQ)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2g_interactions.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2g_interactions.R)| ::: ::: - Course notes: chapter 2 (section 5-7) ### In class: - Workshop on interactions (Exercise 2.8) ## After class: - Tests of linear hypothesis in **SAS**: [theory](https://documentation.sas.com/?docsetId=statug&docsetTarget=statug_intromod_sect043.htm&docsetVersion=14.3&locale=en), [R code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A-linear_hypothesis_tests.R), [**SAS** code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A-interactions.sas) - Exercises 2.5-2.7
